articles.title: R Madhavan tests positive for COVID-19 after Aamir Khan, writes: ‘Farhan has to follow Rancho’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: R Madhavan shared his COVID-19 diagnosis on social media while invoking the film 3 Idiots. His co-star from the film, Aamir Khan, tested positive for the virus on Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Arjun-Malaika attend a cosy get-together with Karan Johar, Gauri Khan as Kareena is ‘waiting for the weekend’. See inside pics - The Indian Express
articles.description: It was party time as Karan Johar, Karisma Kapoor, Gauri Khan and Maheep Kapoor came together for some 'catching up'. However, it was Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor's presence that got all the eyeballs.
